item.title: OpenAI lays out its for-profit transition plans
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description:
OpenAI says its corporate structure must evolve to advance its mission of ensuring artificial general intelligence (AGI) — AI that can complete most tasks humans can — benefits all humanity. OpenAI currently has a for-profit org controlled by a nonprofit, with a “capped profit” share for investors and staff. But in a blog post published […]

item.title: AI sales rep startups are booming. So why are VCs wary?
item.dc:creator: Marina Temkin
item.description:
When you really probe venture capitalists about investing in AI startups, they’ll tell you that businesses are experimenting wildly but are very slow to add AI solutions into their ongoing business processes.  But there are some exceptions. And one of them appears to be an area known as AI sales development representatives, or AI SDRs. […]

item.title: Watch this robotic ‘Superman Suit’ rotate around a gymnastics bar
item.dc:creator: TC Video
item.description:
Scientists at the Suzumori Endo Robotics lab in Tokyo have developed the Superman Suit: a suit powered by hydraulic artificial muscles that allow it to perform superhuman tasks. In this video, the suit demonstrates the ability to complete 15 rotations around a bar, making anyone into a great gymnast.

item.description:

item.title: Microsoft and OpenAI have a financial definition of AGI: Report
item.dc:creator: Maxwell Zeff
item.description:
Microsoft and OpenAI have a very specific, internal definition of artificial general intelligence (AGI) based on the startup’s profits, according to a new report from The Information. And by this definition, OpenAI is many years away from reaching it. The two companies reportedly signed an agreement last year stating OpenAI has only achieved AGI when […]

item.title: PharmEasy investor cuts value of its stake drastically, implying new valuation of $456M
item.dc:creator: Manish Singh
item.description:
Indian online pharmacy PharmEasy is now being valued at about $456 million after its investor Janus Henderson said in a filing that it valued its stake of 12.9 million shares in the startup at $766,043. The asset manager’s Global Research Fund had originally spent $9.4 million to acquire these shares. This valuation is 92% less […]
